text: Would you look at that...A crowd so large they could fill up every seat in the #TDgarden. Better yet, could easily occupy every single restaurant in the back bay. Tell us more about washing our hands & wearing masks though @CharlieBakerMA / @marty_walsh.  #bostonprotest #COVID19 https://t.co/lMCkb1Us2D
